bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Local and Metropolitan Area Networks: Media Access Control (MAC) Security Amendment 1: Galois Counter Mode-Advanced Encryption Standard-256 (GCM-AES-256) Cipher Suite
IEEE Draft Standard for Local and Metropolitan Area Networks: Media Access Control (MAC) Security Amendment 1: Galois Counter Mode-Advanced Encryption Standard-256 (GCM-AES-256) Cipher Suite
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE P802.1AEbn/D0.8 (DRAFT Amendment to IEEE Std 802.1AE-2006)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This amendment specifies the GCM-AES-256 Cipher Suite as an option in addition to the existing mandatory to implement Default Cipher Suite, GCM-AES-128.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
